mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHOP (SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, PRICE, PHOTO, CNT, CODE) VALUES(SHOP_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{price}, #{photo}, #{cnt}, #{code})
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, PRICE, PHOTO, CNT, CODE FROM SHOP WHERE (SUBSTR(CODE,1,1) = SUBSTR(#{code},1,1))
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET POINT = POINT - ((SELECT PRICE FROM SHOP WHERE SEQ = #{shopItem.seq}) * #{itemCnt}) WHERE ID = #{loginUser.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BUY (SEQ, ID, ITEM, CNT, ADDR) VALUES (BUY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{loginUser.id}, #{shopItem.seq}, #{itemCnt}, (SELECT LOCATION FROM HOSPITAL WHERE CODE = #{loginUser.code}))
mapper.select: SELECT SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, PRICE, PHOTO, CNT, CODE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY SEQ ASC) AS RNUM, SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, PRICE, PHOTO, CNT, CODE FROM SHOP WHERE (SUBSTR(CODE,1,1) = SUBSTR(#{code},1,1))) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM SHOP WHERE (SUBSTR(CODE,1,1) = SUBSTR(#{code},1,1))
